page.title: 09SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES,BATH
page.content: WE ASKED ALL THE CHILDREN IN OUR JUNIOR DEPARTMENT WHAT THEY DID IN THEIR SPARE TIME. THIS IS WHAT WE FOUND OUT. EVERYONE WATCHES{TELEVISION NEARLY EVERYDAY.A LOT OF CHILDREN BELONG TO SOME SORT OF{CLUB}SUCH AS BROWNIES,CUBS,YOUTH CLUB,GYM,BOOK, FOOTBALL,EXPLORERS AND BIRD CLUBS.MANY CHILDREN TAKE PART IN{SPORT}SUCH AS JUDO,CRICKET,RUGBY,TENNIS,SWIMMING, BOWLS,SNOOKER,RUNNING AND HORSERIDING. MANY PEOPLE GO TO THE{BATH SPORTS AND {LEISURE CENTRE}ON A TUESDAY.MANY PEOPLE{COLLECT}THINGS SUCH AS RUBBERS,COMICS,ORNAMENTS,BADGES,LEGO, STAMPS,POSTERS,KEYRINGS,THIMBLES,CARS, DOLLS AND BOOKS. { PEOPLE ALSO DO}BMX RACING,READING,GO TO SUNDAY SCHOOL,ORGAN LESSONS,DRAWING, PLAYING THE PIANO,PLAYING THE GUITAR, DANCING AND CHOIR PRACTICE.
